relproducts.title: Stirlo Olive Green
relproducts.description: Stirloolive green plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Burst Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Say aloha to this beautiful emerald blind that is even better than bobbing in a turquoise green ocean. Can a remote chain of tropical islands stop people from looking into your window? Could a the ocean, no? Well this beautiful fabric can do that with ease, and while it does so it floods the room in a beautiful greeny-teal glow that bathes the soul like the warm waters of the pacific. Combining it with other earthy colours is a sure-fire way of creating a space which heals and relaxes before you return to the stresses and distractions of real life.

relproducts.title: Splash Vine Green 89mm Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Breathe life into your living space with this splash vine green vertical blind. Vertical blinds add a stylish, modern look and this light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this green vertical blind is one of their favourites - especially for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. relproducts.title: Harewood Plain Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Our harewood plain is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With its seductive colour palette and attractive prices harewood is one of their bestselling plain ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. The dark green harewood plain green vertical blind is ideal for all rooms.
